name: digital-homes-platform
description: AI-Powered Fractionalized Real Estate Investment Platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run frontend" "npm run backend" "npm run ai-service"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ai-valuation && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: Digital Homes Team
